character.statment: Prehaps I should get more information before going in there.

character.statement: My husband couldn't get out before they closed the tunnels! I hope he's okay...
Now I'll never be able to get my husband to eat his fruit!
I heard there are hundreds of zombies on the other side of the tunnel, but I don't plan on finding out!
No one is allowed through. The island is under quarantine due to the zombie outbreak.

exchange.question: What do you know about these zombies?
exchange.answer: Dr. Romero was working on a cure, but we've lost touch with him. He had been sending us video updates from his phone.

exchange.question: What can I do?
exchange.answer: You can find Dr. Romero - or, if you can't find him, find his cell phone. It has all his research on it.

exchange.question: Anything else I need to know?
exchange.answer: Use that clue notebook to take note of anything that might help. I've written down Dr. Romero's address and phone number for you.

character.statement: I've got a police force full of cowards! Is there no one here brave enough to tangle with a few zombies!?
Well, what about you? Have you got the guts?
You've really got guts, kid. Well done!
Zombies, man... I'm too old for this-
Good work. Now who's going to clean up this mess?
